title: How you guys define toxic, what kind of words can be seen as toxic?
body: I have a game where I just come to practice new champ top Annie, and I am a little bit lag, I didn't blame anyone just told truth that my JG is pretty bad, I said he is stupid and even my teammate agreed with me,  but the enemy top side kept being toxic and said the words like trash and so on. After the game, I got punishment and he didn't. Now I wonder, how you guys define toxic and how the Riot system working ?? Compare between stupid and trash, which one is really toxic? And I swear I didn't say any other rude words except stupid.

replies.body: Soz bro but that’s classificed as toxic.... how would you feel if someone called you stupid in game...

A behavior or a person can be stupid, stupid is a word to say when people do something without thinking, your friend or your parents can say this is a stupid think a stupid behavior but they will never say you are a trash, now you feel difference?

Lol, you realise that both words are offensive. Calling someone stupid for what ever they do shouldnt be toerated as it does nothing to help your team, it just makes the individual feel bad. Do you honestly think it will make him/her play better? 

Also you stated you didnt blame anyone, but you said the jungle is bad and stupid.  To me that is blaming someone. Also was the top opposition guy calling you trash because you were blaming your jungle? 

As what has always been stated on the boards with regards to this blaming others factor... its best not to as it creates arguments over chat which leads to little or no focus on game play. Giving the advantage to the opposition... Think about it.. 

Just be kind... no point in making the situation worse by blaming someone else....

You don’t have to say it dude..
Now let me show you the official definition ... “having or showing a great lack of intelligence or common sense.” 

^thats what u called ur team mate hence toxic

Literally anything and everything remotely negative is seen as toxic here.
Even giving people tips to win is seen as toxic because "MUH NEGATIVITY"

BUT
For some reaasons, quoting people here
AFKing/Int feeding/flaming/being a crappy person isn't seen as toxic player behaviour.
